name: InfiniWorld (RDRapidHyperion)
description:
Explore infinite amounts of worlds, with randomized items and blocks to assist yourself on your journey.

Soon to be revamped with new planets, new entities, new items, new blocks, and new randomization.

Note: In the current version, you cannot save a world yet.

How To Play:

  • A and D to move
  • Space to jump
  • ESC to open the menu
  • F to fly (in creative)
  • Hold left click while hovering over a block to destroy it
  • Right click to use an item or place a block
  • Left click on an entity to attack it

Crafting Recipes:

  • 1-3 ores: 1 ingot
  • 2 ingots and 1 wood: Sword
  • 3 ingots and 2 wood: Pickaxe
